mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SECURE_DATA ( ID, SDBOX_ID, PATH, ENCRYPTED_BLOB, TOP_LEVEL_KV_COUNT, CREATED_BY, CREATED_TS, LAST_UPDATED_BY, LAST_UPDATED_TS ) VALUES ( #{record.id}, #{record.sdboxId}, #{record.path}, #{record.encryptedBlob}, #{record.topLevelKVCount}, #{record.createdBy}, #{record.createdTs}, #{record.lastUpdatedBy}, #{record.lastUpdatedTs} )
mapper.update: UPDATE SECURE_DATA SET ENCRYPTED_BLOB = #{record.encryptedBlob}, TOP_LEVEL_KV_COUNT = #{record.topLevelKVCount}, LAST_UPDATED_BY = #{record.lastUpdatedBy}, LAST_UPDATED_TS = #{record.lastUpdatedTs} WHERE ID = #{record.id}
mapper.select: SELECT ID, SDBOX_ID, PATH, ENCRYPTED_BLOB, CREATED_BY, CREATED_TS, LAST_UPDATED_BY, LAST_UPDATED_TS From SECURE_DATA WHERE PATH = #{path}
SELECT PATH From SECURE_DATA WHERE PATH LIKE '${partialPath}%';
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM SECURE_DATA WHERE PATH LIKE '${partialPath}%';
